content.raw_text: Email 1:- Payment Confirmation Hi Michel, We’ve received your payment of ₹199.00 INR for Spotify Premium on June 20, 2025. Payment summary: Plan: Premium Individual Amount: ₹199.00 INR Date: June 20, 2025 Next billing date: July 20, 2025 (if they include it—optional but sometimes shown) You can view or download your receipt anytime in the Order history section of your [Spotify account] (https://www.spotify.com/account/overview/) community.spotify.com+4support.spotify.com+4community.spotify.com+4. You’re receiving this email because a payment was processed. If you didn’t authorize this charge, please check your account activity or visit Spotify Support. Spotify AB Birger Jarlsgatan 61, 113 56 Stockholm, Sweden Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

Hey isobel, We couldn’t process your Spotify Premium payment on July 2, 2024 using the card on file (maybe expired or insufficient funds). No worries—we’ll retry in a day or two. Plan: Premium Individual Date of failed payment: June 20, 2025 To avoid any interruptions, please update your payment method now: What happens next: – We’ll automatically retry shortly. – Your Premium access remains active for now. – If payments keep failing, your membership might switch to Free. Need help? You can review or update payment details under Account → Payments & billing, or visit our Failed payment help article pcrisk.com+7pcrisk.com+7reddit.com+7tripwire.com+2community.spotify.com+2reddit.com+2support.spotify.com+1support.spotify.com+1. Security note: Spotify will never ask for your full password, CVV, or banking details via email. If anything seems off, head straight to Spotify Support.

Hey Maria, Your Spotify Premium (Individual) plan is set to renew on May 10, 2021. Keep enjoying all the benefits you love: 🎧 Ad-free music ⬇️ Offline downloads 🔊 Unlimited skips and high-quality streaming You’re receiving this email as part of your subscription notifications. If you wish to cancel or update your plan, you can do so anytime in your account settings. Spotify AB Birger Jarlsgatan 61, 113 56 Stockholm, Sweden

Subject: You’ve cancelled your Spotify Premium subscription From: Spotify no-reply@spotify.com To: zoe.thomas91@gmail.com Date: May 12, 2023 Hey Zoe, We’re sorry to see you go — your Spotify Premium subscription has been successfully cancelled. Here’s what that means: Plan: Premium Individual Cancellation date: May 12, 2023 Premium access ends on: June 12, 2023 You’ll continue to enjoy Premium features — like ad-free music and offline listening — until June 12. After that, your account will switch to Spotify Free. Want to come back anytime? Rejoin Premium Or explore our plans This email confirms your cancellation request. If you didn’t request this or need help, visit our Support Center. Thanks for being part of the Premium experience 🎧 — The Spotify Team Spotify AB Birger Jarlsgatan 61, 113 56 Stockholm, Sweden Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

From: Spotify no-reply@spotify.com To: maria.lopez87@gmail.com Date: June 10, 2025 Hey Maria, Welcome to the band! Your Spotify account is all set—let’s get you started. Here’s what you can do next: Download the app on your phone or desktop Create your first playlist — add songs or artists you love Go offline: Download tunes and playlists for offline listening Why Spotify? •  Access millions of tracks and podcasts •  Personalized playlists just for you •  No ads interruptions on Premium •  Stream anytime, anywher You’re receiving this welcome email because you just joined Spotify. If you ever want to leave the band, you can unsubscribe at any time — but we'd hate to see you go! Questions? Check out our Help Center. Follow us on: [Twitter] [Instagram] [Facebook] Spotify AB Birger Jarlsgatan 61, 113 56 Stockholm, Sweden Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions
